assignable.title: assignable
assignable.description: The DigitalResource that constitutes the object of the assignment.

description.en: The DigitalResource that constitutes the object of the assignment.

assignee.title: assignee
assignee.description: The Person who initiated the Attempt of an assigned DigitalResource.

description.en: The Person who initiated the Attempt of an assigned DigitalResource.

count.title: count
count.description: The total number of attempts inclusive of the current Attempt that have been registered by the learner against the assigned resource.

description.en: The total number of attempts inclusive of the current Attempt that have been registered by the learner against the assigned resource.

duration.title: duration
duration.description: A time interval that represents the total time required to complete an activity.

description.en: A time interval that represents the total time required to complete an activity.

endedAtTime.title: endedAtTime
endedAtTime.description: A date and time value expressed with millisecond precision that describes when the activity was completed or terminated.

description.en: A date and time value expressed with millisecond precision that describes when the activity was completed or terminated.

id.title: id
id.description: The Event or Entity identifier.  For an Event, the id MUST be a UUID expressed as a URN using the form urn:uuid:<UUID> per RFC 4122.  For Entities a valid IRI MUST be specified. The IRI MUST be unique and persistent. The IRI SHOULD also be dereferenceable, i.e., capable of returning a representation of the resource.  An Entity MAY be provisioned with a URI employing the URN scheme in cases where a Linked Data friendly HTTP URI is either unavailable or inappropriate.

description.en: The Event or Entity identifier.  For an Event, the id MUST be a UUID expressed as a URN using the form urn:uuid:<UUID> per RFC 4122.  For Entities a valid IRI MUST be specified. The IRI MUST be unique and persistent. The IRI SHOULD also be dereferenceable, i.e., capable of returning a representation of the resource.  An Entity MAY be provisioned with a URI employing the URN scheme in cases where a Linked Data friendly HTTP URI is either unavailable or inappropriate.

startedAtTime.title: startedAtTime
startedAtTime.description: A date and time value expressed with millisecond precision that describes when the activity commenced.

description.en: A date and time value expressed with millisecond precision that describes when the activity commenced.

dateCreated.title: dateCreated
dateCreated.description: A date and time value expressed with millisecond precision that describes when an Entity was created.

description.en: A date and time value expressed with millisecond precision that describes when an Entity was created.

dateModified.title: dateModified
dateModified.description: A date and time value expressed with millisecond precision that describes when an Entity was last changed or modified.

description.en: A date and time value expressed with millisecond precision that describes when an Entity was last changed or modified.

description.title: description
description.description: A brief, plain-text representation of the resource.

description.en: A brief, plain-text representation of the resource.

name.title: name
name.description: A string value comprising a word or phrase by which the resource is known.

description.en: A string value comprising a word or phrase by which the resource is known.

title: Attempt
description: A Caliper Attempt provides a count of the number of times an actor has interacted with an AssignableDigitalResource along with start time, end time and duration information. An Attempt is generated as the result of an action such as starting an Assessment.

description.en: A Caliper Attempt provides a count of the number of times an actor has interacted with an AssignableDigitalResource along with start time, end time and duration information. An Attempt is generated as the result of an action such as starting an Assessment.
